subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The drivers who appear to have berths locked in Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup may as well try to do everything they can to win a race now, because second place will not be worth much when the Chase begins.
snippet: The drivers who appear to have berths locked in Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup may as well try to do everything they can to win a race now, because second place will not be worth much when the Chase begins.
